name: H هـ Pattern
description:
Nothing in art always means nothingness, ruin and emptiness, but sometimes it is a symbol of thirst and desire.
Calligraphy is a method in modern Iranian painting and contemporary calligraphy that was gradually formed by some Iranian calligraphers and painters in the 1930s and 1940s and has continued its life in the field of contemporary art. It has also found followers in many countries in the region. They used a combination of calligraphy and painting, so this method is sometimes called calligraphy and calligraphy.
